title: Operation Summer Storm
description: Tate Maddox is on the run and running out of time. Summer Sheldon has the evidence to clear his name—but it comes at a price. Summer’s sister has been kidnapped and Tate must go on one last mission to rescue her—or the evidence disappears…along with his last chance at freedom.There’s only one way for either of them to get what they want and that is to work together, but how can he trust a blackmailer? How far will she go to save the only family she has left?
author: Karlene Blakemore-Mowle
